svg.text: OPINIONATED DEV WORKFLOWS FOR CLAUDE CODE
capture raw ideas into structured output for /gather
quality convergence: fix failures, re-test, re-review
FOUR WORKFLOWS — PICK THE ONE THAT FITS

g.text: THE SHAPE: CONVERGE, THEN FAN OUT
1 design fans out to N parallel PRs
Worktree isolation | PM gate before code | Parallel, not serial

svg.text: THE RHYTHM: SLEEP WHILE AGENTS WORK
Output: N tickets with TDD contracts

g.text: Plan + build N tickets at once
